Pre-Game Insights: England and Scotland's sporting rivalry began in 1870 with unofficial football contests.
The match is set to take place at the Kensington Oval in Barbados.
England are defending a global title and have a strong T20 team.
Jofra Archer's return from injury adds depth to England's attack.
Scotland's team includes seven players from their 2018 victory over England.
Scotland qualified for the 2024 event with six wins out of six in the regional qualifiers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by rain, resulting in no result.
The pitch in Barbados is slow and sticky, which could favor Scotland.
England's T20 World Cup record against European nations includes losses to Netherlands and Ireland.
Moeen Ali needs two more wickets to reach 50 in T20Is.
Buttler became England's most-capped player and first man to score 3000 runs in T20Is during the series against Pakistan.
